messages.content: You are a TypeScript expert. Convert Google Doc content to BlogPostContent objects. Return only valid JSON.

Convert this Google Doc content to a TypeScript object:

{{$json.content}}

Requirements:
- Extract title, slug, date, excerpt, content
- Generate URL-friendly slug from title
- Format date as YYYY-MM-DD
- Create richContent array with structured blocks
- Preserve formatting as markdown
- Return ONLY the JSON object

Structure:
{
  slug: string,
  title: string,
  date: string,
  excerpt: string,
  content: string,
  richContent: Array<{type: 'paragraph'|'heading'|'list'|'code'|'image', content: string, level?: number}>,
  image?: string,
  tags?: string[]
}
